com.codename1.demos.cordova.plugins.camera

Class CameraPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.demos.cordova.plugins.camera.CameraPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codename1.cordova.CordovaPlugin

    public class CameraPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.codename1.cordova.CordovaPlugin
    An implementation of the Cordova Camera plugin for Codename One.

    This version is built in pure java, on top of the Codename One Capture API. It doesn't currently support all parameters of the standard plugin but should work for simple use-cases.

    Based on The Cordova Camera Plugin, and the code follows the android platform version of the camera plugin.

        Specified by:
        execute in interface com.codename1.cordova.CordovaPlugin
        Parameters:
        action - The action to execute.
        argsList - JSONArry of arguments for the plugin.
        callbackContext - The callback id used when calling back into JavaScript.
        Returns:
        A PluginResult object with a status and message.

      • takePicture

        public void takePicture(int returnType,
                        int encodingType)
        Take a picture with the camera. When an image is captured or the camera view is cancelled, the result is returned in CordovaActivity.onActivityResult, which forwards the result to this.onActivityResult. The image can either be returned as a base64 string or a URI that points to the file. To display base64 string in an img tag, set the source to: img.src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"+result; or to display URI in an img tag img.src=result;
        Parameters:
        returnType - Set the type of image to return.
